name: bde_api
description: RESTful API for CESI's BDE website

scripts.sequelize-skeleton: npx sequelize init:models; npx sequelize init:config
scripts.init-db: cd DIR_WHERE_MYSQL_BIN_IS && echo 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS api_node_demo; CREATE DATABASE api_node_demo CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci' | ./mysql -u root && cd -

author: Kvntn, KindPixel, sfr (Fadingpisces), GrineFather
